verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) I will <S%H3034>give<s%> Thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H430>gods.<s%>

I will <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> And <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and Thy <S%H571>truth;<s%> For Thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> Thy <S%H565>word<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
On the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> Thou didst <S%H6030>answer<s%> me; Thou didst <S%H7292>make<s%> me <S%H7292>bold<s%> with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of Thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
And they will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> For <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
For <S%H3588>though<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> Yet He <S%H7200>regards<s%> the <S%H8217>lowly;<s%> But the <S%H1364>haughty<s%> He <S%H3045>knows<s%> from <S%H4801>afar.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> Thou wilt <S%H2421>revive<s%> me; Thou wilt <S%H7971>stretch<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> And Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1584>accomplish<s%> <S%H1157>what<s%> <S%H1157>concerns<s%> me; Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%> Do not <S%H7503>forsake<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
